post:
We at DigitalBS strive to ensure we deliver not only a great product, but great service. We have been in business for 4 years, so you can be sure in knowing that we know what we're doing. To celebrate the entry into 2020, we have some great offers for you.

Why Choose Us?

Our world class support is active 24/7 with trained staff ready to assist in any way, either talk to someone on livechat or open a support ticket!

We hold an average ticket response time of 20 minutes!
Click to expand...

What makes us so fast?

Cutting-edge features make LiteSpeed-powered sites significantly faster than competitors. Traffic spikes are handled with minimal impact on performance.
Click to expand...

Our servers utilise Litespeed, an Apache web server alternative that loads web pages up to 20X faster page loads compared to standard hosting.

Heres what one of our customers had to say:

I felt it necessary to open up this ticket due to the absolutely excellent support I received from Alex. In fact, I had made it all the way to checkout and then decided not to finalize the purchase due to the fact I didn't like the auto renewal I was being forced to accept.

A short time later, I clicked on one of your emails and entered the client area. After opening the chat window, I had a brief conversation with Alex and was thoroughly impressed. Now let me be clear. When I feel as though I have gotten bad service, I believe it is my responsibility to report it so that a business can take whatever action they deem fit to improve service. At the same time, if I can complain, I also have the responsibility to compliment service that is better than expected.
